QueryResult.text: SELECT R.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME REPORT, NLS.DESCRIPTION, R.TYPE_, R.COMPONENT, R.IS_ACTIVE, R.IS_DIRTY, R.CREATED_DATE, R.CREATED_BY, R.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, R.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_RPT_REPORTS R WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_RPT_REPORTS' AND NLS.PK_ID = R.ID
